Articles.Content:
Can anyone explain how to setup/use the patcher that would be very helpful thanks.

MUTEDBOX:confused:

Download the patcher, put it in your KSP folder.

Run the patcher and enter your KSP Store email address and password.

Select "Update" and press Next/Continue.

Be patient and wait. If you get an unpacking error, just try again. The servers are quite busy, and it's common for the download to get dropped.

Log into your KSP Store account, go to your Profile and click the Download link near the bottom. The first few buttons are for the patcher (Windows and Mac versions), and the rest are for downloading the entire 0.17 or 0.16 zip files.
